caption.title: Mean percentage of newly settled Platygyra acuta larvae and cumulative surviving settlers.
caption.p: Mean (+SE) percentage (%) of newly and cumulatively settled Platygyra acuta larvae in response to different temperature and salinity treatments ( n = 3 replicates per treatment). Data indicated with the same letter showed no significant difference in settlement success (Two-way ANOVA, P > 0.05; Table 1A).
